glosses: Used to indicate that the name of a thing is self-explanatory or self-describing, that it suggests the qualities or attributes it displays.

examples.text: Çünkü adı üstünde o bir çocuk ve çocuk gibi gördüğünü yapar.
examples.translation: Because he is, as the name suggests, a child and does what he sees as a child would.

examples.text: İstisnalar elbette vardır, ama adı üstünde onlar birer istisnadır.
examples.translation: Exceptions indeed exist, but, as their name would suggest, they are exceptions.

examples.text: Bilmeniz gerektiği kadarını biliyorsunuz işte. Yaptığım işler, ailem... Özel hayatımı deşifre etmeyi sevmiyorum, adı üstünde özel. Bu bilinçli bir tercih.
examples.translation: You know as much as you need to know, anyways. The work I do, my family... I don't like exposing my private life, it's in the name, private. This is a conscious choice.

etymology: From ad (“name, title”) + -ı (possessive suffix) + üst (“top, upper”) + -ü (possessive suffix) + -(n)de (locative suffix with "n" as buffer consonant), literally “its name is on it”.
